sys_ui_message.message:
Leave encashment refers to a payout of a portion of your accumulated leave balance. All permanent employees qualify to encash up to **12 days** of accumulated leave per year.
Here is how you can go about making your leave encashment request: 1. On [Workday](https://wd3.myworkday.com/absa/d/home.htmld), type **Create Request** in the search field. 2. Select **Leave Encashment** from the drop-down list. 3. Fill in the questionnaire, ie. the number of days you wish to encash. 4. Click on **Submit**.
Please note that leave encashment successfully submitted on Workday by the payroll cut off date, which is the 10th of every month, is paid in the current month's pay run.
